definition: to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)
to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale
to bind/bunch/bundle/classifier for bunches, bundles, beams of light etc/to control

sentences.english: The code to vest the government with unrestricted power is a "bad" code.
sentences.chinese: 赋予政府不受约束之权力的规矩是“恶”法。

sentences.english: She is loud and wayward; her feet do not stay at home;
sentences.chinese: 这妇人喧嚷，不受约束，在家里停不住脚。

sentences.english: The male beyond the bond is fond of the second wonderful diamond.
sentences.chinese: 那位不受约束的人喜懽第二颗奇异的钻石。

sentences.english: Her nonconformist designs stressed simplicity and comfort.
sentences.chinese: 她那不受约束的设计风格强调简单和舒适。

sentences.english: Now we have the unconstrained vision.
sentences.chinese: 还有人性不受约束的观点。

sentences.english: This fever may signify a person's unbridled temper, abnormal and intemperate.
sentences.chinese: 这热病可象征人不受约束的脾气，不正常而无节制。

sentences.english: The bacteria spin cellulose threads, which bind on the surface forming a layer.
sentences.chinese: 旋转的细菌，在表面形成一层受约束的纤维素线。

sentences.english: Two key characteristics, Mr. Khosla says: 'unbridled confidence and arrogance.'
sentences.chinese: 科斯拉说，两大重要特点是毫不受约束的自信和傲慢。

sentences.english: The constrained view of human nature.
sentences.chinese: 人类本性受约束的观点。

definition: free and unconstrained (idiom); unfettered/unbuttoned/without care or worries
to act as one thinks fit/to have one's own way
to follow the compass and go with the set square (idiom); to follow the rules inflexibly/to act according to convention
to behave oneself/to abide by the rules
coming and going alone (idiom); a lone operator/keeping to oneself/unsociable/maverick
to follow one's heart's desires/to do as one pleases (idiom)
